title: Media
description: Media management screen for accessing and managing device media files and storage

features.description: Browse and view media files including images, videos, and audio
features.developer_perspective: Essential for testing media apps and file handling

features.name: Media Preview
features.description: Preview media files directly within the application

features.name: Storage Analysis

features.name: Media Transfer

features.developer_perspective: Critical for testing media upload/download functionality
